hi: Is there any package differences between the "Desktop/Server/Alternative" install CD ISOs available here: http://mirror.cs.umn.edu/ubuntu-releases/6.06/  (What _exactly_ is the main difference between the D/S/A derivatives?)
Desktop is what you probably want to use.  the server version comes without xorg.  the alternative is an installer CD for ubuntu, but it has no liveCD function
